dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3857711M] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2007 12:24 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3857711M] Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Infringement Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 18 2007 05:23 pm X-MailFrom: joseph@xylex.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Apr 18 17:23:48 2007 Received: (qmail 3201 invoked by alias); 18 Apr 2007 22:23:48 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 3198 invoked from network); 18 Apr 2007 22:23:48 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 18 Apr 2007 22:23:48 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 18 Apr 2007 17:23:48 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 18 Apr 2007 17:23:48 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from joseph@xylex.net) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HeIZ2-0004rL-7v for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 18 Apr 2007 17:23:48 -0500 Received: from server1.xylex.net ([64.191.104.133]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from joseph@xylex.net) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HeIYy-000Lrd-6v for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 18 Apr 2007 17:23:44 -0500 Received: from 70-59-129-186.ptld.qwest.net ([70.59.129.186] helo=joseph) by server1.xylex.net with esmtp (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HeIYv-0003zb-6Z for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 18 Apr 2007 15:23:18 -0700 From: "Joseph Keeler" To: Subject: Copyright Infringement Date: Wed, 18 Apr 2007 15:24:32 -0700 Message-ID: <002c01c78208$584514a0$2201a8c0@joseph> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_002D_01C781CD.ABE63CA0" X-Priority: 3 (Normal) X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook, Build 10.0.6822 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: AceCCFY2GzCbHoTETMaA7BKIUi+29g== Importance: Normal X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - server1.xylex.net X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - xylex.net X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of xylex.net designates 64.191.104.133 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.191.104.133; envelope-from=joseph@xylex.net; helo=server1.xylex.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 18 Apr 2007 22:23:48.0490 (UTC) FILETIME=[3C3676A0:01C78208] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hi- There's a website hosted on one of your servers - http://www.elcadia.com/, that is using my copyrighted logo and materials in their website, on http://www.elcadia.com/portofolio_7.html. They do not have my permission to be using those materials, and I am the legal copyright owner of them. Thank you, Joseph Keeler Xylex Networks, LLC http://www.xylex.net 360-828-0472 or Toll-free 1-888-888-9550 MIME element (text/html)

Hi- There’s a website hosted on one of your servers - http://www.elcadia.com/, that is using my copyrighted logo and materials in their website, on http://www.elcadia.com/p ortofolio_7.html.  They do not have my permission to be using those materials, and I am the legal copyright owner of them.

 

Thank you,

 

Joseph Keeler

Xylex Networks, LLC

http://www.xylex.net

360-828-0472 or

Toll-free 1-888-888-9550

 

MIME element (text/plain)
